title: @riot Quick question about Warmog's Heart
body:
To clarify, if I have 4000 total health, and my health is reduced to 2000, does the passive still stay?

Basically what I'm asking is, is the passive reliant on your current health or total health?

replies.body: It's based on maximum health, so if you're at 20/4000 health and out of combat you will heal like a beast.
Total health's is what matters for the Warmog's Heart effect, what % of that total health you currently have is irrelevant.
So basically, whether you get the passive or not is based on your Maximum Health, not your Current Health?
